title: Kanban
empty: The project administrator has not set any status yet.
status_label: Status {{ statusName }}, Tap left and right arrows to move between statuses.
create_story_permission: You no longer have permissions to create stories
modify_story_permission: You no longer have permissions to modify stories
lost_kanban_access: You no longer have permissions to access this content.
story_title_a11y: {{ref}} {{title}}. Position {{position}} of {{total}}. Press Spacebar to Reorder
